GameConditionDef.label: sun blocked
GameConditionDef.description: A nearby cloudmaker is turning the upper atmosphere opaque, blocking the sun.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A cloudmaker has begun blocking the sun.

GameConditionDef.label: Cloudmaker resurrection
GameConditionDef.description: The spores oversaturating the sky are animating the dead.
GameConditionDef.letterText:
A death-gray cloud has descended on the area.

The spores saturating the upper atmosphere are rapidly descending to the ground and are animating the dead to serve their collective.

Any corpse not under a roof will become a temporary servant for the collective.
